Package org.opengrok.indexer.util

Class SourceSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.util.SourceSplitter
  • public class SourceSplitter
extends Object
    Represents a splitter of source text into lines, where end-of-line tokens -- in accordance with StringUtils.STANDARD_EOL -- are maintained instead of being stripped.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SourceSplitter()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int count()
      Gets the number of split lines.
      int findLineIndex​(int offset)
      Find the line index for the specified document offset.
      String getLine​(int index)
      Gets the line at the specified index in the lines list.
      int getOffset​(int index)
      Gets the starting document character offset of the line at the specified index in the lines list.
      int originalLength()
      Gets the number of characters in the original source document.
      void reset​(String original)
      Reset the splitter to use the specified content.
      void reset​(StreamSource src)
      Calls reset(org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.StreamSource, org.opengrok.indexer.util.ReaderWrapper) with src and null.
      void reset​(StreamSource src, ReaderWrapper wrapper)
      Reset the splitter to use the specified inputs.

        defined instance

      • getOffset

        public int getOffset​(int index)
        Gets the starting document character offset of the line at the specified index in the lines list.
        Parameters:
        index - greater than or equal to zero and less than or equal to count()
        Returns:
        line starting offset
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if index is out of bounds

      • findLineIndex

        public int findLineIndex​(int offset)
        Find the line index for the specified document offset.
        Parameters:
        offset - greater than or equal to zero and less than originalLength().
        Returns:
        -1 if offset is beyond the document bounds; otherwise, a valid index

      • reset

        Reset the splitter to use the specified content.
        Parameters:
        original - a defined instance

      • reset

           throws IOException
        Calls reset(org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.StreamSource, org.opengrok.indexer.util.ReaderWrapper) with src and null.

        Throws:

        Throws:
